name: ESCAPE
description:
The concept of this work is based on the tales of the most famous trade journey in history, the Jalur Sutera. Of course, it was not only for trading goods, but also cultural acculturation that made the trip a success.

Looking at today, it is as if we are faced with similar condition of the same trade route, but with a different pattern, the online route. Online trading, that was originally formed as a system for information today can be used for anything.

We can see how tons of people gain their success, they can even be rich through this online trading route, not only trading, of course, but also how the influence of one another can accept this condition.

And today we got to the point where we can enjoy investing in art through cryptocurrency that are truly amazing and very unexpected in the history of trade, especially the global art market.
